brief.content-text:
The diagram depicts a table containing summary route information, as follows:

Route that can be summarized: 172.16.4.0
Summary Boundary /22
10101100.00010000.000001|00.00000000

Route that can be summarized: 172.16.5.0
Summary Boundary /22
10101100.00010000.000001|01.00000000

Route that can be summarized: 172.16.6.0
Summary Boundary /22
10101100.00010000.000001|10.00000000

Route that can be summarized: 172.16.7.0
Summary Boundary /22
10101100.00010000.000001|11.00000000

The above routes can be summarized to one route as follows: 172.16.4.0
Subnet Mask: 255.255.252.0
Summary Boundary /22
10101100.00010000.000001|00.00000000
Summary Boundary /22 Subnet Mask
11111111.11111111.111111|00.00000000
To summarize into one route:
Router (config) # IP route 172.16.4.0 255.255.252.0 serial0/0/1
